title: Mexican beans and fruit
ingredients: ['½ medium-sized to large pineapple', '2 green-skinned apples, such as Granny Smith', 'juice of ½ lemon', '2 tbsp sunflower oil', '2 onions, chopped', '3 garlic cloves, chopped', '3 ripe tomatoes, preferably plum tomatoes, diced', '1 tsp hot chilli powder or Tabasco sauce, or more to taste', '2 cans borlotti beans, about 400 g each, drained', 'salt', 'fresh coriander to garnish']
